doc.excerpt: We are the only German climate and energy institute to be fully financed privately. Please support our work through your donation. Thank you! Please transfer y

main.p: We are the only German climate and energy institute to be fully financed privately. Please support our work through your donation. Thank you!
Please transfer your donation to our account at the:
